table_caption: Conjoint chronic smoking-related structural alterations and acute drug-induced functional activity changes: cluster coordinates
table_foot: Lettering corresponds to brain regions shown in Fig. 2. Coordinates (X, Y, Z) of the clusters’ peak voxels are reported in Talairach space. Volume is mm3B bilateral, R right, L left, BA Brodmann area, vmPFC ventromedial prefrontal cortex
